addr: King's Cross station London N1 9AL GB
title: The IC Crowd 2015 Christmas drinks
desc: Thanks to  , we invite all of our in-house and agency internal comms enthusiasts to join The IC Crowd co-founders as we say goodbye to 2015 and hello to an exciting 2016 (more information soon, we can't share everything at once)! Tickets are free and the first few drinks and some nibbles are provided by our fantastic sponsor   on a first come first served basis - so get there early to avoid disappointment!
